entry.title: Archlinux 64位安装bcompare
entry.content:
之前用Hexo搭建的Github博客没有备份博文的源文件。。

结果悲剧了，编辑/更新不了，于是转战博客园ヽ(≧Д≦)ノ

先说下如何安装bcompare(Beyond Compare)

[michellgaby@K-on ~]$ sudo yaourt -S bcompare

我们使用yaourt从强大的AUR仓库中安装packages，官方仓库没有收录

安装好后却启动不了(因为我是64位)，还需要安装32位的库

[michellgaby@K-on ~]$ bcompare 
Some Shared Libraries were not found
    linux-gate.so.1 (0xf774e000)
    libz.so.1 => /usr/lib32/libz.so.1 (0xf7722000)
    libqtc.so.1 => /usr/lib32/beyondcompare/libqtc.so.1 (0xf720c000)
    libX11.so.6 => not found
    librt.so.1 => /usr/lib32/librt.so.1 (0xf7203000)
    libpthread.so.0 => /usr/lib32/libpthread.so.0 (0xf71e7000)
    libdl.so.2 => /usr/lib32/libdl.so.2 (0xf71e2000)
    libc.so.6 => /usr/lib32/libc.so.6 (0xf7033000)
    libqt-mt.so.3 => /usr/lib32/beyondcompare/libqt-mt.so.3 (0xf6920000)
    libXext.so.6 => not found
    libX11.so.6 => not found
    libstdc++.so.6 => /usr/lib32/libstdc++.so.6 (0xf6836000)
    libm.so.6 => /usr/lib32/libm.so.6 (0xf67f3000)
    libgcc_s.so.1 => /usr/lib32/libgcc_s.so.1 (0xf67d9000)
    /lib/ld-linux.so.2 (0xf774f000)
    libXrender.so.1 => not found
    libXrandr.so.2 => not found
    libXcursor.so.1 => not found
    libXinerama.so.1 => not found
    libXft.so.2 => not found
    libfreetype.so.6 => not found
    libfontconfig.so.1 => not found
    libXext.so.6 => not found
    libX11.so.6 => not found
    libSM.so.6 => not found
    libICE.so.6 => not found

这时要在/etc/pacman.conf开启multilib

#[multilib]
#Include = /etc/pacman.d/mirrorlist

取消掉上面这两行的注释然后再强制更新所有软件包列表

[michellgaby@K-on ~]$ sudo pacman -Syy

接着安装上所缺少的库就行了

[michellgaby@K-on ~]$ sudo pacman -S lib32-libx11  lib32-libxext lib32-libxrender lib32-libxrandr lib32-libice lib32-libsm lib32-libxft lib32-libxinerama lib32-libxcursor

这样就可以运行Beyond Compare了，最后附上一枚key

jp1e8CgYjJ4zf0KhAe8QTR25SFOyWGshdxeqq1esijXleGGAT-Sr0LeFQTvBkeMSRfqNx32mm8oiqLyaoaV5R+
